name: Unlock
description:
# Notes.

You will not be able to solve all the problems.
This is a nihilistic game.
No hints. You are on your own.

# Rules

Select a stage.
Tap to enter the password.
>Tap to enter the password.
When the password you entered is correct, the key will be unlocked.
You can get items by clearing the stage... Extra.

Well, I don't think you can clear it.

# Other.

This game is an early release version.
>It will be updated if it is well received. In other words, there will be more hell to pay.

...distribution terms and conditions, etc.
>Nothing in particular. Please use it for chatting!
>However, it is a game of eternal emptiness.

Why did you make this game?
>I got the idea when I saw a lottery ticket...

It's not funny.
>Because it's nihilistic.

Can you clear all the stages?
>I can clear all the stages because there are no bugs. But... What do you mean all the stages?
The odds are astronomical.
